review_criteria.SOLID: Single Responsibility, Open/Closed, Liskov Substitution, Interface Segregation, Dependency Inversion
review_criteria.KISS: Keep It Simple, Stupid - 不必要な複雑性を避ける
review_criteria.YAGNI: You Aren't Gonna Need It - 不要な機能を追加しない
review_criteria.DRY: Don't Repeat Yourself - 重複を避ける
